BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: Uses particular and unhealthy methods by use of mining resources to increase productivity.
The Arena trains soldiers by making them practice the art of fighting against slaves.

BuildingInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Grants extra [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] points based on the number of assassinations and specialists that joined the city

BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: Harsh environments can create hard and useful people.

BuildingInfo.Description: Kwizatz Haderach's Prescience by Spice Usage

BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: Contrary to the rule on Arrakis, House Richese decided to specialize the Suspensors instead of Thopters.
The Refinement Complex is an assembly plant that also has the means to refine several different materials to increase their value - a Richesian speciality.

BuildingInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Doubles the Amount of Siege, Hornet, Vehicle, Thopter, Suspensor, Transport and Mech Units Trained in the City
BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: A "monument" to the production efficiency of the Richesians - it is a production room that works side by side with other production facilities and will duplicate part by part any mechanic unit that was queued in the city. It gathers the best tech workers and they are paid handsomely (many, though, perish prematurely by work stress and exhaustion).
All hammer improvements around the city's fat cross are destroyed
Off-world Spice trade will make you rich
Off-world Spice trade will make you rich
